text: Hi everyone! Could someone please have a look at a new package registration for KROME.jl? <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/29997|https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/29997>? It seems to be blocked due to naming similarities, but since the package is a wrapper for the KROME library (<http://kromepackage.org/|http://kromepackage.org/>) I feel like it should really be named after it.

text: There are also some other blocking reasons mentioned, but I am not sure what they mean or if they just follow from the naming conflict
